hardware.title: Real Estate Presentation Reimagined
hardware.subtitle: Your Display. Your Choice. Intelligent Layout.
hardware.text1: Simply use your existing TV* or opt for a professional 24/7 signage display. Say goodbye to printing costs, faded listings, and outdated offers.
hardware.text2: Present your properties in a modern and dynamic way instead. The highlight: The display adapts automatically. Whether you're showcasing a single top property or a selection of up to 10 listings at once – the exposé sizes scale dynamically and always make optimal use of the screen space. Control everything conveniently via our cloud – whether on PC or smartphone.
hardware.footnote: *Requirement for using your own devices is an internet connection and an integrated web browser.
hardware.cardText: Whether 32" or a massive 98", portrait or landscape: Our solution adapts. It works location-independently on almost any internet-enabled display – in Germany, Mallorca, or wherever you want to reach your customers.
hardware.recommendationNote: For the perfect storefront, we recommend displays specifically designed for continuous operation (24/7) – with high brightness (important in sunlight!), reliable cooling, and long lifespan.
hardware.serviceNote: On request, we deliver fully pre-configured signage displays. The principle: Unpack, connect, link to the internet – done.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about digital property presentation
faq.a1: A digital display is a virtual presentation that you create in our cloud portal. You define which properties appear on it and how the display looks. The special part: You can show this digital display on as many physical screens as you want – you only pay once. If you want to show different content, simply create another digital display.
faq.a2: No. You can use any internet-enabled display – whether an existing Smart TV or a professional signage display. You choose the hardware, we provide the software.
faq.q3: How many properties can I display at once?
faq.a3: You can present up to 10 properties simultaneously on one display. The layout scales automatically – whether a single top property or multiple listings in tile view. If you want to show more than 10 properties, you need a second digital display and another physical screen.
faq.a4: In the cloud portal, you create properties with key data and photos. You can then assign these to your displays. Changes are visible immediately – no manual updating required.
faq.a5: Changes appear on the display immediately after saving. The displays automatically update the content, so the current status is always shown.
faq.a6: Yes. You can create multiple locations and assign properties specifically. User management is also included – you decide who has access to what.
faq.q7: How does the QR code per property work?
faq.a7: When creating a property, you can add a link, for example to the property page on your website. A QR code is automatically generated from this on the display. Interested parties scan and go directly to the information.
faq.a8: After signing up, you receive access to the cloud portal. There you create your properties and generate a presentation link. This link is opened on the display – done. Alternatively, we offer a complete setup service.
faq.q9: Do I need the CMS or TV manufacturer's software?
faq.a9: No. Once the display's web browser is linked to our system, we take over. Think of the display as a pure monitor: All control of your properties and content happens exclusively through our intuitive cloud solution. You don't need to learn or operate any complicated manufacturer software.
faq.q10: What are the acquisition costs for an office setup?
faq.a10: It's more affordable than many expect. For a modern 50" display, you can roughly budget around €500. The big advantage: Thanks to dynamic presentation, you can show up to 10 properties simultaneously or rotating on this single device. An example: Equip your office with three large displays, and hardware costs are around €1,500 (plus monthly software fees). For comparison: The same investment often only gets you conventional, static LED light frames for paper printouts. With us, you get a modern, digital multimedia solution for the same money.
